casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. CAPITAL ROYALTY PARTNERS II, L.P.
v.
SERROTT 2018-1214 Supreme Court of Ohio. September 27, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

In Prohibition. On motion for leave to intervene of Navidea Biopharmaceuticals, Inc. Motion granted. Intervening respondent, Navidea Biopharmaceuticals, Inc., ordered to file its responsive pleading within five days.
